mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Tools.PackageServer
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Sets up a server to store and distribute packages among C1 users. Presents packages in the Administrative console if added as the package source in C1.
